name: part_009
file: tmp_【#沙花叉クロヱ生誕LIVE】シャチ爆誕！初ゲストあり！【沙花叉クロヱ⧸ホロライブ】 [_rgeHcQu0Tc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Sakamata Chloe performs a series of 10 rapid-fire 'Image Oogiri' jokes where she provides funny captions for random images.
Chloe receives a key, opens a treasure chest, and finds an electric guitar for her performance.
Chloe introduces and begins performing her song 'Perfect Crime' while playing the guitar.

subtitles.original: これ、ど、ど、どうしたらいいの？
subtitles.english: What, what, what should I do with this?

subtitles.original: え、沙花叉が画像大喜利を10連発すんの？
subtitles.english: What, Sakamata has to do 10 image Oogiri in a row?

subtitles.original: 何それ地獄の時間？ちょっとやめてもらっていいですか？
subtitles.english: What's with this hellish segment? Can you please stop?

subtitles.original: 歌いたいな～、なんか何度も歌いたくなる
subtitles.english: I want to sing... I feel like singing over and over again.

subtitles.original: 分かりました、じゃあ、行きますか？
subtitles.english: Alright, well, shall we go?

subtitles.original: あの、1枚目とか、あるんですかね？1枚目どうぞ！
subtitles.english: So, is there a first one? First image, please!

subtitles.original: そろそろこのお好み焼き焼くのも飽きてきたな～
subtitles.english: I'm starting to get tired of cooking this okonomiyaki...

subtitles.original: 2枚目！
subtitles.english: Second image!

subtitles.original: あ、最近老眼入ってんだよな～
subtitles.english: Ah, my presbyopia has been kicking in lately...

subtitles.original: 老眼入ってんだよな～！な！老眼入ってんだよな～！
subtitles.english: Presbyopia's kicking in! Right! Presbyopia's kicking in!

subtitles.original: 厳しいな！はい次！
subtitles.english: That's tough! Okay, next!

subtitles.original: バック・トゥ・ザ・フューチャー！
subtitles.english: Back to the Future!

subtitles.original: 出ないか、そうだよね、良くないしね、はい次！
subtitles.english: Didn't work? Right, it's not good anyway. Next!

subtitles.original: なんだこの時間！
subtitles.english: What is this segment?!

subtitles.original: え、待って次、次、次、次！
subtitles.english: Wait, next, next, next, next!

subtitles.original: あなたを殺せば、最後なのよね？
subtitles.english: If I kill you, it'll be the last one, right?

subtitles.original: ダメ？痛い… ああ… くそ、次！
subtitles.english: No? Ouch... Ah... Dammit, next!

subtitles.original: 見て見て、親知らず生えた！
subtitles.english: Look, look! My wisdom tooth came in!

subtitles.original: お、いけた！え、嘘、誰が笑った、今ので！
subtitles.english: Oh, it worked! Wait, really? Who laughed at that?!

subtitles.original: えーいけるんだ！え、やった！親知らずでいけました、やった！
subtitles.english: Wow, it worked! Yay! I passed with a wisdom tooth joke!

subtitles.original: え、なに、なんか、せっかくだからもうちょっとウケてくださいって言われたんだけど… よし、はいどうぞ、どうぞ！
subtitles.english: Wait, they told me to try and be funnier since we're here... Alright, go ahead, next!

subtitles.original: もう全部使いたいのね、尺を。はい。
subtitles.english: You just want to use up all the time, don't you. Fine.

subtitles.original: 家族の命が、かかってるんだ！
subtitles.english: My family's lives are on the line!

subtitles.original: あーいいんだ、それもいいんだ。それも許されるんだ、はい。はい次。
subtitles.english: Oh, that's okay too? That's allowed? Fine. Next.

subtitles.original: 何だこれ。
subtitles.english: What is this even.

subtitles.original: ああ…分かんない、同じ気持ちになっていいよって感じだけど
subtitles.english: Ah... I don't know, it's like 'feel free to feel the same way'...

subtitles.original: 分かんないよ、むずい、何やらされてんの！
subtitles.english: I don't know! It's hard! What are you making me do!

subtitles.original: スロット、打ってらっしゃる？あー…
subtitles.english: Are you playing slots? Ah...

subtitles.original: いや、打ちたいんだけどな、黒字なんだけどなー
subtitles.english: Well, I want to play, but I'm already in the black...

subtitles.original: あ、いいんだ、それもいいんだ。へー、基準が分からんな。なんか、しょうもないなーと思っても通る、意外と。
subtitles.english: Oh, that's okay? Really? I don't get the criteria. It passes even if it's lame.

subtitles.original: ラストらしいです。
subtitles.english: Apparently, it's the last one.

subtitles.original: これすればエサもらえるんだよな～
subtitles.english: If I do this, I'll get some food...

subtitles.original: OK！沙花叉の気持ちでした。
subtitles.english: OK! That's how Sakamata feels.

subtitles.original: これすればエサもらえるんだよな～、ありがとうございました、どうも。
subtitles.english: If I do this, I'll get food. Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: 地獄の企画に付き合わせてしまい、すみません。本当に、あの、事前に何も教えてもらわずに、いきなりバンって出されたやつなんで、沙花叉も動揺しておりますが。
subtitles.english: Sorry for making you sit through that hellish segment. Honestly, I wasn't told anything beforehand, it was just suddenly thrown at me, so I'm flustered too.

subtitles.original: これでじゃあ沙花叉、鍵ゲットしたんですか？え、ちょうだい！ちょうだい、ちょうだい、鍵は！
subtitles.english: So, with this, did Sakamata get the key? Hey, give it to me! Give it, give it! The key!

subtitles.original: 鍵もらいたいの、沙花叉。あ！
subtitles.english: I want the key. Ah!

subtitles.original: 持ってる！すごーい！
subtitles.english: I have it! Amazing!

subtitles.original: え、じゃあこれ開けれる？ギターもらえるの、沙花叉？
subtitles.english: Wait, so I can open this? Does Sakamata get the guitar?

subtitles.original: へ、へ、へ、あ、せーの、ガチャ！
subtitles.english: Hehe... alright, ready, set, open!

subtitles.original: 通せんぼせんぞ、捕まえたくない…
subtitles.english: I won't block the way, I don't want to catch you...

subtitles.original: サマリー箱を開けました。
subtitles.english: I opened the summary box!

subtitles.original: おおーすごーい！いいんですかこれ？ええー！
subtitles.english: Whoa, amazing! Is this for real? Wow!

subtitles.original: あざまーす！入ってたー！
subtitles.english: Thank you! It was inside!

subtitles.original: かっこよくない？すごーい！ギターもろた、もろた、もろたー！
subtitles.english: Isn't it cool? Amazing! I got a guitar, I got it, I got it!

subtitles.original: では、次の曲、ギターを弾きながら行きたいと思います。
subtitles.english: Now, for the next song, I'll be playing the guitar while I sing.

subtitles.original: 行きます。聴いてください。
subtitles.english: Here we go. Please listen.

subtitles.original: Perfect Crime.
subtitles.english: Perfect Crime.

subtitles.original: Perfect Crime
subtitles.english: Perfect Crime

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲: 吾由 / 編曲: THE 118's
subtitles.english: Lyrics & Composition: Ayu / Arrangement: THE 118's
